questions.quote: I know. Somebody around here has been giving Wilhelm the impression that I have been slacking off.
Wait a second! I never baited a hook with a rye before. Your hook is too small. This is for, like, a muffin. All right. Take it away.
Wait a minute? He's picking up the van tonight? This is perfect. I'll drive Rhisa to someplace romantic. Then when my father slides the door open, I'm in the van kissing his brother's daughter.
Yeah, it was sad for a Three Stooges, what with the dead baby and the Stooges being executed and all.
What's the difference, you're a woman. They're supposed to be touching you.
Well, I guess this would be all right. Jimmy, you remember Elaine? She's gonna watch you tonight.
It's one think to not give me the extension But to tease and to torture me like this. There's no call for that.
Well, it doesn't even have to be the general manager. Maybe I could be like, an announcer. Like a color man. You know how I always make those interesting comments during the game.
Oh, it was very funny. There was one great scene with the chef - what was his name?
Yeah.. like a pirate..  Anyway, ah, you know, we're hoping to, um, raise enough money.. with this.. uh..
